p: SARS-CoV-2 main protease, RdRp, spike protein with ACE2 receptor and MERS-CoV with hDPP4 receptor, the four natural ligands Catechin, Quercetin, Hederagenin and Oleanolic acid showed best docking scores as compared to reference drugs such as Remdesivir, Favipiravir and Hydroxychloroquine upon molecular modeling. The binding affinities with surrounding amino acid residues of ligand interactions ( Table 1).
